page.title: 18 LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES.
page.content: A survey of 150 people in Shiremoor showed that whilst a half of the number said that their only recreation was to visit "pubs and clubs" many took part team games e.g.football,cricket,darts, golf and badminton.Swimming and windsurfing were also mentioned as growing in popularity although people had to travel out of the area to participate in them. The more regional hobbies of Whippet Racing,Pigeon Racing and Leek Growing were the other most popular activities of the area. Street Games played by the children throughout the area were very much the same e.g.Hide and Seek,Hop Scotch and Cannon were the most popular,closly followed by Stick in the Mud and Traffic Lights.
